org.apache.kafka.streams.test

Class OutputVerifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.kafka.streams.test.OutputVerifier
  • Deprecated. 
    Since 2.4 use methods of TestOutputTopic and standard assertion libraries instead

    @Deprecated
public class OutputVerifier
extends Object
    Helper class to verify topology result records.
    See Also:
    TopologyTestDriver
